prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets and provide your predictions.
You have been given RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT from web search for each market.
Use this information to make more informed predictions.


Market 1:
Title: Will ACA premium tax credits be extended and will the Republican Party win the House in 2026?
Recent trade: $1,180.38 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/aca-credits-extended-house-winner-2026

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, the U.S. Senate has failed to extend the enhanced Affordable Care Act (ACA) premium tax credits, which are set to expire at the end of this year. This inaction is expected to lead to significant increases in health insurance premiums for millions of Americans starting January 1, 2026. The Democratic proposal to extend the subsidies for three years was rejected in a 51-48 vote, lacking sufficient Republican support. Similarly, the Republican alternative, which offered a one-time $1,500 payment to individuals below 700% of the federal poverty level, was also voted down. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/legal/litigation/republican-controlled-us-congress-poised-allow-obamacare-health-subsidies-expire-2025-12-11/?utm_source=openai))

The expiration of these subsidies is projected to more than double the average annual premiums for ACA Marketplace enrollees, increasing from $888 in 2025 to $1,904 in 2026. This substantial rise is anticipated to result in approx...

---

Market 2:
Title: Will Aztec launch a token by December 31, 2026?
Recent trade: $1,000.00 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/will-aztec-launch-a-token-in-2025

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
Aztec Network, a privacy-focused Ethereum Layer 2 solution, has recently made significant strides toward launching its native token, AZTEC. The public sale of AZTEC tokens concluded on December 6, 2025, raising approximately 19,476 ETH (around $61 million) from over 16,700 participants. ([theblock.co](https://www.theblock.co/post/381618/aztec-network-raises-over-60-million-in-eth-with-community-first-token-sale-testing-new-auction-model/?utm_source=openai)) This sale utilized a novel Continuous Clearing Auction (CCA) mechanism developed in collaboration with Uniswap Labs, aiming to ensure transparent and fair price discovery. ([cointelegraph.com](https://cointelegraph.com/news/uniswap-launches-continuous-clearing-auctions-token-sales?utm_source=openai))

The AZTEC token is designed for staking, governance, and potential transaction fees within the network. Validators are required to lock up 200,000 AZTEC tokens to participate in securing the network. ([cryptorank.io](https://cryptorank...

---

Market 3:
Title: Will Lionel Messi play in the 2026 FIFA World Cup?
Recent trade: $607.77 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/will-lionel-messi-play-in-the-2026-fifa-world-cup

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, Lionel Messi has not definitively confirmed his participation in the 2026 FIFA World Cup. In a recent interview, Messi stated, "I haven't made a decision yet about the World Cup. Match by match, I'll finish the season, then have preseason, and in six months, I'll see how I feel." ([goal.com](https://www.goal.com/en-us/lists/lionel-messi-argentina-future-open-for-2026-world-cup/blt40e8991c1eb8d290?utm_source=openai))

Messi's Argentina teammate, Nicolás Otamendi, expressed confidence in Messi's potential participation, saying, "I don't see Leo missing out on the World Cup." ([espn.com](https://www.espn.com/soccer/story/_/id/45587896/lionel-messi-unlikely-miss-2026-world-cup-nicolas-otamendi?utm_source=openai))

Additionally, Messi's former teammate Ariel Ortega believes Messi will be present at the 2026 World Cup, noting his current high level of performance and lack of serious injuries. ([amp.marca.com](https://amp.marca.com/en/world-cup/2025/12/09/693864eaca47...

---


Provide predictions for each market in the specified format.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.
Use this context to make more informed predictions.

For each market, provide your prediction in this exact format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Reasoning: [brief 1-2 sentence explanation that references the news context if relevant]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES means you would bet on the "Yes" outcome
- NO means you would bet on the "No" outcome
- NO_TRADE means you would not take a position

Be concise and focused on the most promising opportunities.
consensus_summary: Consensus strongly predicts "NO" for Market 1 due to the confirmed expiration of ACA credits, and "YES" for Market 2 given Aztec's completed token sale. For Market 3, opinions are split between "YES" and "NO_TRADE," reflecting the uncertainty from Messi's non-committal statements versus optimistic teammate assessments. Overall, Markets 1 and 2 show high agreement with clear news-driven rationales, while Market 3 remains speculative.

openai.response:
MARKET 1: NO  
Reasoning: The failure to extend the ACA premium tax credits and the political split in Congress suggest low likelihood of extension before the end of 2025. Additionally, with the Republican Party not supporting the extension and given the current Senate composition, it seems unlikely they would win the House in 2026, aligning with the recent "No" trades.

MARKET 2: YES  
Reasoning: Aztec Network has already conducted a successful public sale of its tokens, raising significant funds and involving many participants. This indicates strong momentum and commitment to launching the token before the end of 2026, making a "Yes" bet more favorable.

MARKET 3: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: While Messi has not committed to playing in the 2026 World Cup, comments from teammates suggest optimism about his participation. However, his personal indecision and the time remaining before the event add uncertainty, making it prudent to avoid taking a definite position at this time.

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: NO  
Reasoning: The recent news confirms the Senate has already failed to extend the ACA premium tax credits, with the subsidies set to expire at the end of 2025, making the first condition impossible to fulfill.

MARKET 2: YES  
Reasoning: The context shows Aztec Network has already conducted a successful public token sale in December 2025, raising significant funds, which strongly indicates the token launch process is actively underway well before the December 2026 deadline.

MARKET 3: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: While Messi has not ruled out participation and teammates are optimistic, his own statement indicates no final decision for at least six months, creating high uncertainty that doesn't justify a clear directional bet at this time.

opus.response:
MARKET 1: NO
Reasoning: The news confirms the Senate has already failed to extend ACA premium tax credits as of December 12, 2025, with the subsidies set to expire at year end. Since this is a compound "AND" market requiring both credit extension AND Republican House win in 2026, the failure to extend credits means this market resolves NO regardless of the 2026 election outcome.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: The news clearly indicates Aztec has already conducted a public token sale that concluded on December 6, 2025, raising ~$61 million for the AZTEC token. With the token sale completed and the token designed for staking/governance, a formal launch by December 31, 2026 is virtually certain.

MARKET 3: YES
Reasoning: While Messi hasn't definitively confirmed participation, his statements indicate he's keeping the door open ("I'll see how I feel"), teammates express confidence he'll play, and he's reportedly performing at a high level without serious injuries. Given Argentina is co-hosting and Messi's competitive drive, participation is more likely than not.

gemini.response:
MARKET 1: NO
Reasoning: The news explicitly states that as of December 12, 2025, the U.S. Senate failed to extend the ACA premium tax credits, and they are set to expire at the end of 2025. Since the first condition (extension of credits) is highly unlikely to be met, the market will resolve to NO.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: The news indicates that the public sale of AZTEC tokens concluded on December 6, 2025, confirming the token's launch or imminent distribution well before the December 31, 2026 deadline.

MARKET 3: YES
Reasoning: Although Lionel Messi has not definitively confirmed his participation, his teammates and former teammates express strong confidence in him playing the 2026 World Cup, citing his current high performance level and lack of serious injuries.

claude.response:
MARKET 1: NO
Reasoning: The Senate has already failed to extend ACA premium tax credits as of December 2025, with both Democratic and Republican proposals rejected. The subsidies expired at year-end, making extension highly unlikely. Republicans maintaining House control in 2026 midterms during a first-term presidency is also historically challenging.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: Aztec's public token sale already concluded on December 6, 2025, raising $61 million from over 16,700 participants. The token is designed for staking and governance with validators requiring 200,000 AZTEC tokens, indicating imminent launch well before the December 31, 2026 deadline.

MARKET 3: YES
Reasoning: Messi remains non-committal but hasn't ruled out participation, stating he'll decide based on how he feels after the season. His teammate Otamendi and former teammate Ortega both express confidence he'll participate, noting his strong current performance and lack of serious injuries at age 38.
